title: The Last Oracle
description: Can love defy death itself? From Bestselling author, Delia Colvin, THE LAST ORACLE, is the passionate finale to The Sibylline Trilogy that weaves Greek mythology with a modern tale of eternal love! Alex has waited 3000 years to finally marry his soul mate...his symbolon. But as the wedding comes to fruition, their secret plans are discovered and now no one is safe! In order to triumph over these forces, the oracles must risk a return to the secret entrance to the Underworld. There they must find and revive the first oracle, Myrddin, whose jumbled mind holds the key to their survival. But that solution also forces Alex and Valeria to face the battle of their lives, for a single chance to change their fate! THE SIBYLLINE TRILOGY - a love more enduring than life...than death...than destiny
author: Delia J. Colvin
